.

LOCALITY: Germany [S 2 Ƥ in SMNS ]. Synonymy:
Landrock ( 1912 )
.

DISTRIBUTION: PALAEARCTIC : Europe : Austria , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Czech Republic , Estonia , Finland , France , Germany , Italy , Norway , Poland , North European Russia , South European Russia , Slovakia , Sweden , Switzerland , UK .

Note : According Kjaerandsen et al. ( 2007 ) “… remaining type material consist of two specimens in poor condition, without terminalia. A. M. Hutson designated a male lectotype , now without terminalia (possibly on a separate slide). Further remaining material determined as
B. bimaculata
by Zetterstedt belongs to
B. maculipennis
and
B. ingrica
”.
